Financial Option liquidation problem Cc PST Norman I ran a couple of test calcs to follow up our discussion last week re the problem The day lag between the financial trueup and option liquidation causes liquidation value falling out of book on the flow date the day after expiry In summary a Your suggestion of tureup to current business day does hold the current day leg in liquidation report HOWEVER b It causes problems for indexforward deals I did a test calc on STPJM book PostID and if you compare its swap liquidation report to the official calc postid you will see the difference caused by truing up to current business day After talking to Stacey we think changing the code in portcalc to force it hold the current day leg in liquidation report is probably the best way to correct this problem Please let us know what do you think Thanks Hai
